record.title: THE CALENDAR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that it be in order for the Senate to proceed en bloc to the consideration of the following calendar items: Calendar No. 214, S. Res. 225; Calendar No. 215, S. Res. 230; and Calendar No. 216, S. Res. 235.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolutions be agreed to en bloc, the preambles agreed to en bloc, the motions to reconsider be laid upon the table en bloc, the consideration of these items appear separately in the Record, and any statements related thereto be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
